thread.section_title: The Iroquois New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Another great stay
thread.title_full: Another great stay - Review of The Iroquois New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Polly H
title: Another great stay
text: I was only here one night but my room was comfortable enough for a much longer stay. I had a deluxe queen room which was quite nice. The bathroom actually had shelves, towel bars and hooks to make it useful unlike so many minimalist bathrooms you find elsewhere. This is an old fashioned hotel, so I do miss a coffee maker in the room (there is complementary coffee in lobby). But the personal service is great, the bed comfy and the price is excellent for a midtown quality hotel.
